name: Oma Lost
description:
Oma Lost is a student project realised at HEAJ (Belgium). It's a 2D platformer and puzzle game where you follow the story of Zepli, a little pillow living with his Grandma in a mechanical world.

In order to maintain functional the universe, you'll have to reach the center of each planet and fix their clockwork hearts. To help you progress, she gave you her winding key, allowing you to interract with the elements and creatures of the environment,

Concerning the ambiance, all the drawings are handmade before being digitally composed, trying to give the feeling we are playing a traditionnal graphic novel or cartoon.

If you want to be informed of our progression on this game, you can follow us on :
